contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Schijndel | image_flag = Schijndel_Netherlands.svg | flag_size = 120x100px | flag_alt = Flag of Schijndel | image_seal = | seal_size = | seal_alt = | image_shield = Schijndel wapen.svg | shield_size = 120x100px | shield_alt = Coat of arms of Schijndel |image_map = LocatieSchijndel.png |mapsize = 250px |coordinates_display = inline,title |coordinates_region = NL |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = [[North Brabant]] |area_footnotes = (2006) |area_total_km2 = 41.65 |area_land_km2 = 41.54 |area_water_km2 = 0.12 |population_as_of = 1 January 2007 |population_note = Source: [[Statistics Netherlands|CBS]], [http://statline.cbs.nl/ Statline]. |settlement_type = Municipality |population_total = 22911 |population_density_km2 = 552 |timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] |utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +2 |latd=51|latm=37|lats=|latNS=N |longd=05|longm=27|longs=|longEW=E }} '''Schijndel''' ({{pronunciation|220 Schijndel.ogg}}) is a [[municipality]] in the southern [[Netherlands]], in the province of North Brabant. Schijndel is located approximately {{convert|14|km}} southeast of [['s-Hertogenbosch]]. Schijndel was founded on the 6th of December in the year 1309. == Population centres == *Schijndel *[[Wijbosch]] The population of the town Schijndel in 2005 was 23,005. This figure has remained virtually unchanged since the 1990s. Although officially marked as a village the town has a population that is large enough to be considered a town, but since [[municipal charter|city charters]] are no longer being given to municipalities in the Netherland Schijndel remains a village. ==Notable people born in Schijndel== *Gérard Buzen, Belgian general\minister of defense *André Gevers, cyclist *[[Winy Maas]], architect *[[Wiljan Vloet]], football manager *[[Carli Hermès]], photographer and director *[[Jack de Gier]], football player *[[Hein Van de Geyn]], jazz bassist *[[Sissy van Alebeek]], cyclist *Ronald Mutsaars, cyclist *Manon van den Boogaard, football player == External links == {{Commons category|Schijndel}} *[http://www.schijndel.nl Official website] {{Geographic location | Centre = Schijndel | North = [[Bernheze]] | East = [[Veghel]] | South = [[Sint-Oedenrode]] | West = [[Sint-Michielsgestel]] }} {{North Brabant Province}} {{Use dmy dates|date=October 2010}} [[Category:Municipalities of North Brabant]] [[Category:Populated places in North Brabant]] {{NorthBrabant-geo-stub}}
